storyInfo: Guests arrive at Siesta on the eve of its imminent relocation, and Mayor Herman personally goes to greet them. A short meeting ensues between the two, both as leaders, and as fathers.

attributes.content: It's already 10:30, and you still want coffee? You still have time to worry about coffee?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Move your ass away from the coffee maker and put it in front of your desk where it belongs.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: *cough*...!
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: How are you doing with the revisions from the feedback we got last time? There's not much time left until the 3 o'clock meeting.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: I already updated the proposal. Here.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: The feedback from the last meeting was pretty clear. We basically got a few solutions handed right to us, and incorporating them was a simple matter.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: The speech is ready to go as well.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: There's not much time left. We've got three days until the weekend, and we need to have the proposal finalized by then so the other departments have time to implement it.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Be extra careful. The mayor's been very clear about his intentions, and this isn't like before.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Volcanoes don't wait for anyone. And I'm not joking around when I say that.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. I know.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Let me take a look at what you've written.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Here, it's this one. The speech is attached underneath.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: ...To be honest, when I was drafting this proposal, it felt like there was one issue that couldn't be resolved internally, so that needs to be brought up at the meeting for the boss to discuss with the mayor.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Which issue?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: It's hard to say, but let me explain first.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: You see, we proposed a plate-by-plate migration model for this relocation, with the key technical and managerial personnel for each plate going first.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Their numbers are small enough for us to manage, and they've already completed the move. Once they assume their posts in the core sector, we can start preparing to move the rest of the population.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: The fixed demand treats each plate as a unit, with each unit moving in sequence. However, all the proposals made so far fail to provide enough transportation capacity, even if we bring in external logistics companies.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: I see. So?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Ideas on their own are worthless without plans. How are you going to deal with this issue?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: I hope you're not planning to bring it up at the meeting just to let the Bureau of Administration and Transport worry about it.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: A few logistics companies alone won't be able to provide the capacity we need.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The professional transport management capability of a cutting-edge logistics company, hmm...
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: This is Siesta City Hall. Mayor Herman speaking.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Apologies for the interruption, Mr. Mayor. I'm here to confirm today's itinerary with you.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Please take a look here.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: This portion of your schedule has been arranged beforehand.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: I need your input though, because I just received a phone call from one of our logistics partners, who will arrive in Siesta around 1 PM.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Your original itinerary has a 3 PM meeting with various departments to discuss the relocation efforts. With so many departments each having their own schedule, delaying it isn't an option, and it is unlikely that it will be cancelled either.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Shall I serve as your proxy at the meeting then?
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: ...No. Come with me to meet our caller. Have another secretary start the meeting.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Make sure he takes the minutes and have him turn them over to me after it's finished.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Do we need to let the other departments know that we've been in talks with logistics partners?
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: ...You can go ahead with that.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But only mention that we may be cooperating with foreign logistics companies. If all goes well, we'll consider introducing a new logistics management model and bring that up at the meeting.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Alright. I'll be going then.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: ...Yes, that's the current situation.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: The mayor will be discussing things with our clients this afternoon, and the meeting will pertain to the subject matter I just mentioned. Please refer to this document.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: This message comes straight from the mayor. Any questions?
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: None from me. Appreciate the heads up.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Listen up, you still have four hours, starting now.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Look, here's another version of the proposal I prepared earlier. It's a letter of intent for the introduction of a new logistics management model.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Hah, would you look at that...
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: I'll let you in on a bit of good news then. If this job ends up being a success, everyone's getting a bonus.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: So do your best out there!
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Hello, Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Thank you for reaching out to us. It's an honor to have this opportunity to cooperate.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: No need to thank me, cooperation is a matter of mutual benefit.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Is this your son?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Haha, I'd like him to get a wide variety of experiences as soon as possible. If he never goes out and sees the world, he won't be able to adapt to the changing climate.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Hello, Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Good afternoon.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: As a token of our meeting, I'd like to present you with this watch.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Thank you. However, I don't believe it's appropriate for me to accept gifts from MountainDash Logistics at this point, either publicly or privately.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Mr. Eurill, we've previously spoken about our project's needs over the phone. We've invited you to Siesta in the hopes of reaching a final agreement on our contract.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Haha, I see you like to get right to business.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: We've already read the documents sent by City Hall. Given the size and scale of MountainDash Logistics, we are more than happy to have the opportunity to work directly with the municipal government.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Naturally, we also hope that this joint endeavor will be a fruitful one.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: So what does MountainDash think of the terms of the contract?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You are a man of honor, Mr. Mayor, and MountainDash is more than willing to sign.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: However, because cooperation is a two-way street, I would like to renew our discussion about the quote.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: This wristwatch—
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Can be stopped at any time, Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: MountainDash has quite the appetite.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hahaha, you misunderstand me!
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: What I meant to say is that we are willing to provide this service free of charge.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: What are your terms?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Take a look at this, sir. This is a 'Letter of Contractual Intent' drafted by MountainDash.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Since we will be working directly with the municipal government, we also hope to take our cooperation to the next level.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: What we would like is for MountainDash to be able to start a new subsidiary in Siesta, not restricted by local competitors and Messengers.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I thought as much.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Then I assume you know the weight of what you are asking for, Mr. Eurill.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Herman leans lightly back in his seat.
Ahem.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Mr. Mayor, your scheduled three o'clock meeting is about to begin.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You have a very sharp secretary.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: My criteria for one are not based strictly on ability, but also on whether or not they can understand what I'm thinking. It also depends on the situation.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: City Hall has no shortage of candidates.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Mr. Mayor, though you recognize that a distant spring is ill suited to quench an imminent thirst, you still choose to live far away.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: As you've just heard, my meeting is about to start, so—
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Is there anything else MountainDash would like to show us?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: What if I told you that we're capable of meeting both your needs?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: We're not here to make money, but to solve problems.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: What do you see as the 'problem' then?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Whatever you might need help with.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: And what exactly do you think I need?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Restructuring.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: After establishing a new logistics company built off of MountainDash, you'll be able to leverage them to facilitate free trade and establish a network of trade agreements not beholden to any political entity—
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Imagine a future where Siesta will be able to enter the markets of foreign countries as a neutral entity under those agreements, becoming a commercial hub capable of supporting its local businesses and government.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Well, I can see that MountainDash has a clear vision. Thank you for your time.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The secretary steps forward, ready to receive the documents Herman is handing back.
Eurill then leans forward.
Mr. Mayor, what do you think of Columbia's pioneering business model?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Tkaronto circles the country year-round, bringing continuous economic benefits to Columbia.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Tkaronto?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Tkaronto.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Designed as a pioneer trade city, it will never have a future beyond what Columbia has planned for it.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Pioneer cities have always been different from other nomadic cities. They couldn't have less in common with Siesta.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The only common thread is that its immediate benefit to Columbia far outweighs the potential risks of its somewhat independent status.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: So Tkaronto will continue to chug along, extracting things from the wastelands that other nomadic cities cannot.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Do you understand me, Mr. Eurill?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Ultimately, you are the mayor of Siesta, and you have the final say.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: However, Tkaronto's economic model has been set in stone, and will not change in the future.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: By contrast, Siesta is now moving away from this beautiful beach.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Who will have the final say when the water is no longer visible?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Haha! As you know, Mr. Mayor, Great Yan is thousands of miles from here. Quite the journey, even with modern transportation.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: MountainDash is but a private company in distant Lungmen, unable to do anything drastic. But since you extended your courtesy to us, we came.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Take a look at this, if you please.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Though we've always conducted business in and around Lungmen, our earnings can hardly be considered insignificant.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: From what I hear, that volcano's giving Siesta a hard time limit. This city could be gone before my kid here is old enough to start a family.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Opportunities are scarce, and time waits for no man.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: ...So that's why you brought a watch.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Herman casts a glance at Bison, who is sitting farther back along the table.
And what does your son think of this proposal?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: My son?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Oh, me? Sorry Mr. Mayor, I'm actually not involved in this...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Haha, don't worry, I'm just making small talk.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: So to be clear, you want us to finish negotiating this contract by today?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...As the executive manager of MountainDash Logistics, that is my hope.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Though I may not be personally involved with this project, I do know that as logistics companies develop in the future, they will not be merely transporting goods and materials, but also facilitating the exchange of economies and cultures.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We have both the vision and the capacity, and we will not fall short of your expectations.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So how about it, Mr. Mayor?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Hahaha!
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I have a daughter who also thinks a great deal about Siesta.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Before she and my other daughter left the city, I promised her I'd work to create her ideal version of it.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The nomadic city of Siesta. It will be a wonderful place.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hah, thanks for all your hard work in making this contract possible.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: That said, the sun is about to set, and the view around this time is most spectacular. Shall we continue our discussion outside?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: That's the last of the batch. Once we finish selling our inventory, we should pack up and head for the new city.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Heh, the nostalgia's really starting to catch up with me. I grew up here since I was a little kid, and can recognize every grain of sand.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: I'll have to bring a bottle of it with me when I leave. Who knows if I'll ever get the chance to return.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: I won't, will I...?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: Who can say? It's too early to start moping.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Oh, someone's heading our way. Go get their attention!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Welcome, welcome! Try our special charcoal-grilled sandworm legs! The shop's about to relocate in a few days, and we might have to change to a completely different menu by then! Get them while you still can!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Wh-What is this?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sandworm... legs?!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: What are you freaking out over this time?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: ...I must say, the scenery isn't the only thing unique about Siesta.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Ah, during the last Obsidian Festival, there was a young lady who sold this sort of barbecue.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: It became an instant hit, and now it's a popular local snack.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: (Hold up, is that the mayor?)
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: (Why are you asking me? You think I've met the mayor? Am I not meeting the exact same people as you every day?)
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: (Should we...?)
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: (I think we just act normal.)
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: Hahaha, would our wonderful visitors like to give it a try?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I think we'll pass for now?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I am curious though. What is that facility over there that's been spinning around this whole time?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Oh, that? That's the burdenbeast carousel.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: It's another attraction that popped up during the Obsidian Festival. For whatever reason, a large number of people kept going to ride it every day.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Are you all tourists?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Here, I'll give you a free sample. Give it a try! If you like the taste, take a few more with you!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Oh, thank you. I guess I'll take another one then. Here's your money.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So you're not just cute, but courteous too!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Oh, uh... thank you.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: You know I'm still here, right?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper B

attributes.content: Haha!
attributes.name: Shopkeeper A

attributes.content: Mr. Mayor, Mr. Eurill, this way please.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Enjoying a meal while overlooking the ocean is incredibly popular among tourists. The view here is simply unbeatable.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Even after the relocation, Siesta will continue to retain this aspect. Even as a nomadic city, she will not lose what was once hers.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Of course not. You've done your diligence to ensure that.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Your dishes are ready. Please enjoy.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Ahh, beautiful scenery and delicious food. Fresh fin sashimi truly is an altogether different experience. By the way, those two shopkeepers earlier mentioned changing their menu after relocating.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: There's no shortage of things to take into account as a small businessman.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Some of the beachside recreational facilities have yet to be removed. You and your son are welcome to experience them for yourselves.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I appreciate the offer, but I think I'll be fine here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Your son is incredibly well-behaved. Most children his age would've already dragged their parents off to buy tickets.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hah. That's the heir of MountainDash Logistics you're looking at. Though I'm also fine with him walking his own path.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: By the looks of things, you've been teaching him well from an early age.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: It's good to have an eye out for the future.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hah, as if. It's also apparent that he still has a long way to go.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: He's a bit better-behaved these days, but you have no idea how much he worried me when he was younger.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: You're being too modest, Mr. Eurill.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: This isn't a matter of modesty. If you ask me, every father has gone through the same thing. Just don't laugh at what I'm about to tell you—
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: When he was around four years old, the school held a parent-child event, and I went to participate.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: But when I got there, I realized it was actually a tug-of-war competition. His mother wasn't in good health at the time, so I had to join in.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I assume you've never lost a game of tug-of-war?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...Right, nobody can beat me in that, so it didn't take long for us to get first place.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: But the problem was, the other little kids weren't going to take their loss lying down. After seeing us win, they all wanted in on it. They started running over and tugging at my legs, calling me 'dad' in the hopes that I'd help them win.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Pfft... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: What'd your wife say...?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: She wasn't there at the time, because of her poor health.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Lucky man.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But my kid here sure was generous! He pushed me out there himself, saying that the teacher taught him that sharing is caring.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I didn't dare open my mouth.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Dad!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hahaha!
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I believe you mentioned before that you have two daughters?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Two daughters...
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Herman leans lightly back in his seat.
One of them puts my mind at ease. The other, the furthest thing from it.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Heh. Although I suppose I could also say that I don't have to worry about either of them.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Haha. I never would've expected you to treat your children that way.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: This was a few years back, but when the troublesome one was still going to university in Victoria, I almost never got invited to go see her.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Only once did I make the time to go over to her school to talk to her professor about how she was doing.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: So imagine my surprise when I found out she'd gotten someone else to pretend to be her father for the parent-teacher conference.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Your daughter's got some serious guts.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: That is one thing she'll never be short on.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I stayed there and listened in for a while. I was pretty angry at the time, but I had to admit...
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: That daughter of mine... The flowers grown in a greenhouse may be elegant and beautiful, but I'd rather she be the weeds that sprout up there instead.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: To be able to do that proves that she indeed is my daughter. So I trust that when she's out there on her own in the world, she has the ability to overcome any obstacle.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: What's more, she's a good judge of character.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You see, later on, I sent someone to contact the man she had impersonated me.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Oh? Do tell.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I ended up asking him to come work for me.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Ahahaha! As expected of you.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: He must've been quite talented indeed.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: ...*cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Oh, are you him?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: You flatter me, sir.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Hahaha, what a story.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: So, how are your daughters doing these days?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: They're both working elsewhere now.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Mhm. Just a little longer, and I plan to kick this kid out too, so he can get a good, hard look at the real world.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I have a few old friends over in Lungmen. They're a bunch of knuckleheads, but I know that as long as they're around, nothing bad's going to happen to my boy.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: It's no easy feat trying to make sure your kids turn out fine when they grow up.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I'm sure you're only here because you wanted the best for your son.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I fall far short of my wife in that respect.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: A few years ago, between my young son and my sick wife, I was seriously considering scaling back the business.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: She wrote dozens of letters interrogating me. Haha, if not for Rim Billiton and Great Yan being thousands of miles apart, I'm sure she would've given me an earful in person.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: It's thanks to those letters that MountainDash is what it is today, and the kid and I turned out the way we are.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: ...You truly are a lucky man.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Herman falls silent while gazing at the waves crashing against the shore.
I hope your wife gets well soon.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: 'Mr. Mayor,' hm.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Just call me Herman.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Mr. Herman... I can truly see now that you're not just a mayor, but a father as well.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Haha. You're not quite what I was expecting either, Mr. Eurill.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Care for a glass?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Victoria's grapes are sanguine in color and rich in aroma.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Barrel-brewed in Gaul with a light, cedar-baked flavor.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: Have a taste. I brought it from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: —Ahh.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Silly old me. I've had so much to drink that I can't even hold my glass straight.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Haha, no point in crying over a bit of spilled wine. Happens all the time.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I'll pour you some more. As long as you don't drop the glass itself, that is.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: I don't even know how long it's been since I've held out my glass like this. What if my hand shakes and I end up breaking it?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hahaha! Don't worry, I'll hold your hand steady.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: These hands of mine have conquered an entire school in tug-of-war.
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: ...I suppose I have nothing to worry about then.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The two men raised their glasses and looked out across the scenery before them.
The sun was setting, but the surface of the ocean glimmered even more brightly than it had during the day.
Mr. Eurill.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Eurill

attributes.content: The wine you brought from Lungmen... It's good stuff.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: It's not something that would normally make its way into Siesta, is it?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Then I trust that it'll also suit the tastes of people from other countries.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Haha. And I trust that Siestans will enjoy this wine all the same.
attributes.name: Eurill
